Name: Metropole
Ingredients: 2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist expressed & discarded. Adorn with Skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A Cognac Manhattan mellowed by a dash of sugar.
History: The Metropole first appears in George J. Kappeler's 1895 Modern American Drinks and was the signature cocktail of the Hotel Metropole , located just off Times Square at Broadway and 42nd Street. It is a subtle adaptation of the 1884 Metropolitan Cocktail .
Nutrition: One serving of Metropole contains 131 calories
